text: aur ve tumase maasik-dharm ke vishay mein poochhate hai. kaho, "vah ek takaleef aur gandagee kee cheez hai. atah maasik-dharm ke dinon mein striyon se alag raho aur unake paas na jao, jabatak ki ve paak-saaf na ho jaen. phir jab ve bhalee-bhaanti paak-saaf ho jae, to jis prakaar allaah ne tumhen bataaya hai, unake paas aao. nissandeh allaah bahut tauba karanevaalon ko pasand karata hai aur vah unhen pasand karata hai jo svachchhata ko pasand karate hai
